message.body: Ahoy! It's Ben, from ################. Got any free time today? My schedge is wide open.
hey! uh, yeah, i guess i don't really have anything going in either.
Well, I'm old, so my bedtime is like 6:30pm. Want to grab some "coffee" at, say, 3?
especially if "coffee" actually means coffee! where did you have in mind?
I guess it means coffee. Inman Perk is the ushe for me...does that work for you?
for sure.
Swell, I'll see you there at 3 then. I'll probz be wearing a white Dan Deacon shirt and jeans.
i'll probably be wearing a purplish north face and and pretending like i know what a dan deacon is. see you then!
Better make it 3:30 if that's alright.
yup, that's cool.
okay, my texting app doesn't seem to be a fan of me today, but the answer was yes. i apologize if this is like the third message you've gotten.
On my way. I am an idiot and I went to the wrong place.
where did you go?
To the bar where i always meet people. I will be there in like 10....PS I will buy your drinks when I get there. Sorry...I'm a moron
hahaha, it's totally okay. see you soon.
(1/2)PS... I had fun even though I feel like we did nothing, and PPS...I intend to ask you to hang out again...probz this week even. I'm not
(2/2)fragile though, so if you don't want to, don't worry about telling me. Hope your dinner is wonderful!
PPPS...hope you survive the bus. And PPPPS...if we hang out again, I'll meet you by Emory. I'm totes nice like that.
(1/2)PPPPPS...I know we spent a while together, but it still felt like the day got cut short. Any interest in getting together again
(2/2)tomorrow after school?

hey, sorry i didn't reply to this sooner, i had people over and got distracted. unfortunately, i don't get out of class til 5 tomorrow and i'm undoubtedly going to be exhausted, so i don't think i can hang out.
Hmm, see now that sounds more like you are making an excuse because you just don't want to hang out anymore. No worries, kiddo :)
